title: Renegade Ops v1.13 + DLCs (working online)
description:
================================================================================
Renegade Ops v1.13 + DLCs
================================================================================

Multilanguage


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer.
- The game is updated to version 1.13 and nothing has been deleted.
- The "Coldstrike campaign" and the "Reinforcement pack" are included.
- Multiplayer works, both split-screen and online (using Steam).


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Run the .exe file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does thanks to Voksi and Revolt.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: Yes, Steam must be loaded, though the game has to be run from its .exe file (use the shortcut).

Q: Does it work under Windows 8.1?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
